sections.title: General
items: Prices are in JPY and include the session fee and a post-session learning summary.
In-person sessions are available within limited locations—contact me for details.

sections.title: Discounts
items: FIRST20: 20% off your first private 1:1 lesson (Standard or Compact).
FIRST20 is not valid for package purchases.

sections.title: Packages (credits)
items: Each credit equals one session of the purchased type and duration.
Schedule within the validity window.
4-Pack: valid 120 days from purchase; 8-Pack: valid 240 days from purchase.
Credit usage: 1 credit per session held, or if you cancel within 24 hours of the start time.
Rescheduling allowed up to 24 hours before start.
Credits are for the purchaser only and are not transferable.

sections.title: Monthly Member Plan
items: The Monthly Member Plan is a subscription of ¥20,000 per month and includes 4 hours of lesson time.
You can mix 60-minute and 30-minute sessions freely within your available hours (online or in person, subject to the usual location conditions).
The effective hourly rate is ¥5,000 (same as the Standard 8-Pack).
The plan auto-renews every month until you cancel via the Stripe customer portal or by contacting us.
You can cancel anytime before the next billing date; your plan remains active until the end of the current paid month.
Unused hours roll over to the next month, up to a maximum of 4 rollover hours.
Members can book additional lessons at the discounted member rate of ¥4,800 per 60 minutes (or equivalent).
If you usually take one lesson per week, note that some months contain five weeks. The 5th lesson can be covered using rollover time or booked as an additional member lesson (¥4,800).

sections.title: Refunds — Single Lessons
items: Cancel >48h before: refund minus a ¥500 cancellation/admin fee (free reschedule also available).
Cancel 24–48h before: 50% refund.
Cancel within 24h or after the session occurs: no refund (except in case of service issues on my side).

sections.title: Refunds — Packages
items: Refundable within 48 hours of purchase if unused; refund minus a cancellation/admin fee of ¥1,000 (4-Pack) or ¥1,500 (8-Pack).
After 48 hours or once any credit is used: non-refundable.
No refunds after the validity period ends.

sections.title: Refunds — Monthly Member Plan
items: First-time purchase only: if you request a refund within 24 hours of purchase and no lessons have been taken, we will cancel the subscription and provide a full refund for that month.
After 24 hours, or once any lesson in the billing month has been taken, the current month is non-refundable.
You may cancel at any time before the next billing date to stop future charges; remaining hours can be used until the end of the current paid month, subject to the rollover rules above.

sections.title: Payment
items: Online lessons: please pay within 24 hours of booking to keep your spot (payment link provided by email).
In-person lessons: pay online in advance or in cash on the day.

location.title: Location Info
location.body: In-person sessions currently available in Shibuya, Tamachi, and Shinagawa upon request. Locations outside these areas are subject to additional charges.

corporate.title: People Strategy Consulting
corporate.body: I don’t just coach individual skills — I build alignment across people, culture, and direction.
